S0467: It's next to the car park.
S0469: Pero eso no significa que no podamos cambiarlo.
But that doesn't mean we can't change it.
S0470: ¿Qué tan alto quieres escalar antes de que paremos?
How high do you want to climb before we stop?
S0471: Do you want to stop for a rest?
S0472: Parte del problema es que no sabemos los hechos.
Part of the problem is that we don't know the facts.
S0474: Ni siquiera lo quiero como oferta gratuita.
I don't even want it as a free offer.
S0475: Hay muchas razones para considerar esperar.
There are many reasons to consider waiting.
S0476: Estoy esperando el final de la segunda mitad.
I'm waiting for the end of the second half.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
